title: Bug 117981: Item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. 

OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item. 

EB: The item should be selected on the first attempt. 

SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item.
3. Observe that the item is not selected, and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Select the same item again and observe that it can now be selected.
